TITLE: Preset
MSG_0:
The address and the port number are stored as

the preset in this view.
MSG_1:
New Preset

The button add for the new server port and address preset.
MSG_2:
Edit Preset

The button edit for the exist server port and address preset.
MSG_3:
New / Edit Preset

New / Edit Preset are consisted as below fields.
MSG_4:
Preset Name

This is preset name on list table.

Server Address

This is network name or IP address of the broadcast server.

Server Port Number

This is network port number for broadcast server.

Stream Name

The name is identifier of stream on broadcast server.

On wowza streaming server,

the streaming name are consisted of

application name, slash symbol and streaming name

(Ex. live/streamname).
